attributes.action: increase grants and their take-up for low carbon technologies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current low carbon grants are too low to incentivise and are much higher in , for example, Ireland.  The conditions that have recently been imposed reduces incentive further.  The grant system in place appears to be a sop to Kyoto and something the Treasury simply does not really want to fund.  Much more needs to be done to get these technologies off the ground.
